query:
UPDATE messages m
            SET raw_data = '',
                message_data = NULL,
                recipients = '{}',
                delivery_details = '{}'
            FROM projects p
            WHERE m.project_id = p.id
              AND m.created_at < NOW() - (p.retention_period_days * INTERVAL '1 day')
              AND octet_length(m.raw_data) > 0;
